txt.en: The Corsairs who took over this town and frightened away all the villagers seem to have drunk their fill, and now lie in a stupor in the store-house of Lothgobel.\n\nYou should drive off the Corsairs, for they are a danger and a nuisance to all who stand in their path.
The Corsairs who took over this town and frightened away all the villagers seem to have drunk their fill, and now lie in a stupor in the store-house of Lothgobel.
Drunken Corsairs can be found in the store-house of Lothgobel in central Lamedon.\n\nYou should defeat drunken Corsairs.
Drunken Corsairs can be found in the store-house of Lothgobel in central Lamedon.\n\nYou should defeat drunken Corsairs.
You have defeated several of the drunken Corsairs who took over the store-house in Lothgobel.
You have defeated several of the drunken Corsairs who took over the store-house in Lothgobel.
